name: Hard Counting
description:
It's a game that will make you take control of
robot that have the ability of flying in different places.
your goal in the game is to collect a specific number of scores
by collect colored diamonds before the time is finished
There are three types of dimonds the first one is the green
dimond which give you five-points, the second type is the pink diamond
which give you eight points and the third type are the blue diamond
which give you twelve points
you must avoid the laser as possible as you can because it makes you lose your points
